summary: Canyon's Law, introduced in the Senate, aims to prohibit the use of M-44 devices (cyanide bombs) on public land. The bill outlines the dangers of these devices, citing their toxicity, harm to non-target animals and humans, and previous incidents of injury and death. It mandates the removal of existing M-44 devices within 30 days of the bill's enactment and defines key terms related to the devices and public land management agencies.
